verses.verse: Run ye to and fro<WH7751> through the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem<WH3389>, and see<WH7200> now<WH3045>, and know, and seek<WH1245> in the broad places<WH7339> thereof<WH4672>, if ye can find a man<WH376>, if there be<WH3426> any that doeth<WH6213> justly<WH4941>, that seeketh<WH1245> truth<WH530>; and I will pardon her<WH5545>.
And though they say<WH559>, As Jehovah<WH3068> liveth<WH2416>; surely they swear<WH7650> falsely<WH8267>.

O Jehovah<WH3068>, do not thine eyes<WH5869> look upon truth<WH530>? thou hast stricken<WH5221> them<WH2342>, but they were not grieved; thou hast consumed<WH3615> them<WH3985>, but they have refused to receive<WH3947> correction<WH4148>: they have made their faces<WH6440> harder<WH2388> than a rock<WH5553>; they have refused<WH3985> to return<WH7725>.
Then I said<WH559>, Surely these are poor<WH1800>; they are foolish<WH2973>; for they know<WH3045> not the way<WH1870> of Jehovah<WH3068>, nor the law<WH4941> of their God<WH430>:

I will get<WH3212> me unto the great men<WH1419>, and will speak<WH1696> unto them<WH3045>; for they know the way<WH1870> of Jehovah<WH3068>, and the law<WH4941> of their God<WH430>. But these with one accord<WH3162> have broken<WH7665> the yoke<WH5923>, and burst<WH5423> the bonds<WH4147>.

Wherefore a lion<WH738> out of the forest<WH3293> shall slay<WH5221> them<WH2061>, a wolf of the evenings<WH6160> shall destroy<WH7703> them<WH5246>, a leopard shall watch<WH8245> against their cities<WH5892>; every one that goeth out<WH3318> thence shall<WH2007> be torn in pieces<WH2963>; because their transgressions<WH6588> are many<WH7231>, and their backslidings<WH4878> are increased<WH6105>.

How <WH335> can I pardon<WH5545> thee<WH2063>? thy children<WH1121> have forsaken<WH5800> me<WH7650>, and sworn by them that are no<WH3808> gods<WH430>. When I had fed them to the full<WH7650>, they committed adultery<WH5003>, and assembled themselves in troops<WH1413> at the harlots<WH2181>' houses<WH1004>.
They were as fed<WH2109> horses<WH5483> roaming at large<WH7904>; every one<WH376> neighed<WH6670> after his neighbor<WH7453>'s wife<WH802>.
Shall I not visit<WH6485> for these things<WH5002>? saith Jehovah<WH3068>; and shall not my soul<WH5315> be avenged<WH5358> on such a nation as this<WH1471>?
Go ye up<WH5927> upon her walls<WH8284>, and destroy<WH7843>; but make<WH6213> not a full end<WH3617>: take away<WH5493> her branches<WH5189>; for they are not Jehovah<WH3068>'s.
For the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> have dealt very<WH898> treacherously<WH898> against me<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.
They have denied<WH3584> Jehovah<WH3068>, and said<WH559>, It is not he<WH7451>; neither shall evil come<WH935> upon us<WH7200>; neither shall we see sword<WH2719> nor famine<WH7458>:
and the prophets<WH5030> shall become wind<WH7307>, and the word<WH1696> is not in them<WH6213>: thus shall it be done unto them.

Wherefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, the God<WH430> of hosts<WH6635>, Because ye speak<WH1696> this word<WH1697>, behold<WH5414>, I will make my words<WH1697> in thy mouth<WH6310> fire<WH784>, and this people<WH5971> wood<WH6086>, and it shall devour them<WH398>.

Lo <WH935>, I will bring a nation<WH1471> upon you from far<WH4801>, O house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>: it is a mighty<WH386> nation<WH1471>, it is an ancient<WH5769> nation<WH1471>, a nation<WH1471> whose language<WH3956> thou knowest<WH3045> not<WH8085>, neither understandest what they say<WH1696>.
Their quiver<WH827> is an open<WH6605> sepulchre<WH6913>, they are all mighty men<WH1368>.

And they shall eat up<WH398> thy harvest<WH7105>, and thy bread<WH3899>, which thy sons<WH1121> and thy daughters<WH1323> should eat<WH398>; they shall eat up<WH398> thy flocks<WH6629> and thy herds<WH1241>; they shall eat up<WH398> thy vines<WH1612> and thy fig-trees<WH8384>; they shall beat down<WH7567> thy fortified<WH4013> cities<WH5892>, wherein thou<WH2007> trustest<WH982>, with the sword<WH2719>.
But even in those days<WH3117>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, I will not make<WH6213> a full end with you<WH3617>.

And it shall come to pass<WH559>, when ye shall say, Wherefore<WH8478> hath Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430> done<WH6213> all these things unto us<WH559>? then shalt thou say unto them<WH5800>, Like as ye have forsaken me<WH5647>, and served foreign<WH5236> gods<WH430> in your land<WH776>, so shall ye serve<WH5647> strangers<WH2114> in a land that is not yours<WH776>.
Declare <WH5046> ye this in the house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290>, and publish<WH8085> it in Judah<WH3063>, saying<WH559>,
Hear <WH8085> now this<WH5530>, O foolish people<WH5971>, and without understanding<WH3820>; that have eyes<WH5869>, and see<WH7200> not<WH241>; that have ears, and hear not<WH8085>:

Fear <WH3372> ye not me<WH5002>? saith Jehovah<WH3068>: will ye not tremble<WH2342> at my presence<WH6440>, who have placed<WH7760> the sand<WH2344> for the bound<WH1366> of the sea<WH3220>, by a perpetual<WH5769> decree<WH2706>, that it cannot pass<WH5674> it<WH1530>? and though the waves thereof toss<WH1607> themselves<WH3201>, yet can they not prevail; though they roar<WH1993>, yet can they not pass over it<WH5674>.
But this people<WH5971> hath a revolting<WH5637> and a rebellious<WH4784> heart<WH3820>; they are revolted<WH5493> and gone<WH3212>.

Neither say<WH559> they in their heart<WH3824>, Let us now fear<WH3372> Jehovah<WH3068> our God<WH430>, that giveth<WH5414> rain<WH1653>, both the former<WH3138> and the latter<WH4456>, in its season<WH6256>; that preserveth<WH8104> unto us the appointed<WH2708> weeks<WH7620> of the harvest<WH7105>.
Your iniquities<WH5771> have turned away<WH5186> these things<WH2403>, and your sins have withholden<WH4513> good from you<WH2896>.
For among my people<WH5971> are found<WH4672> wicked<WH7563> men<WH7918>: they watch, as fowlers<WH3353> lie in wait<WH7789>; they set<WH5324> a trap<WH4889>, they catch<WH3920> men<WH582>.
As a cage<WH3619> is full<WH4392> of birds<WH5775>, so are their houses<WH1004> full<WH4392> of deceit<WH4820>: therefore they are become great<WH1431>, and waxed rich<WH6238>.

They are waxed fat<WH8080>, they shine<WH6245>: yea<WH5674>, they overpass in deeds<WH1697> of wickedness<WH7451>; they plead<WH1777> not the cause<WH1779>, the cause of the fatherless<WH3490>, that they may prosper<WH6743>; and the right<WH4941> of the needy<WH34> do they not judge<WH8199>.
Shall I not visit<WH6485> for these things<WH5002>? saith Jehovah<WH3068>; shall not my soul<WH5315> be avenged<WH5358> on such a nation as this<WH1471>?
A wonderful<WH8047> and horrible thing<WH8186> is come<WH1961> to pass in the land<WH776>:

the prophets<WH5030> prophesy<WH5012> falsely<WH8267>, and the priests<WH3548> bear rule<WH7287> by their means<WH3027>; and my people<WH5971> love<WH157> to have it so<WH6213>: and what will ye do in the end thereof<WH319>?
